plot: A man returns to his childhood home and discovers how much he truly loved his father. He encounters souvenirs filled with colors and nostalgia.
title: Chroma
plot_es: A man returns to his childhood home and discovers how much he truly loved his father. He encounters souvenirs filled with colors and nostalgia.
plot_en: A man returns to his childhood home and discovers how much he truly loved his father. He encounters souvenirs filled with colors and nostalgia.
